content: Fire and rescue reciprocating saw blades Longer-lasting reciprocating saw blades for fast, heavy-duty metal cutting in firefighting and rescue work ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster, tougher, longer-lasting reciprocating saw blades for when every second counts Faster cutting – bimetal blades for increased cutting power and lifespan Heavy-duty build – thicker-gauge blades like these are essential when you need stability and durability Three lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Emergency extrication, such as vehicle rescue and dismantling Extra-heavy-duty demolition Cutting wood beams Cutting pipes, tubing and structural steel Cutting drywall ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 10 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 10 | Blade features | Long life, Fast cut, Heavy duty, Exact angle ### ITEMS- 2222115 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 10 (5) rescue - Package Size 5 pc - 2221956 - Recip. saw blade SP 12 10 (5) rescue - Package Size 5 pc
